name: Noninterferance
description:
You know that story, your toxic family member won't leave you alone and try to interact with you with the best intentions, but this time you will defend yourself. 

Push this people from your expanding safe zone, you need some space to live. The more you let them in your life, the more anxious you become. Now, it's time to stop.

Try your best to manage them, all out at once, or at least to save as much sanity as you can.

Control:

You can't

Move/Fight/Cast fireballs

SO WHAT CAN I DO TO PROTECT MY SELF?

You can resist. Each family member has a "key" to push them away. Be with the flow and follow instructions.

Just to be sure, if someone encounter any critical bugs (like black screens) let me know pls, I'll try to fix as fast as i can. Thx.
